title: Lemon and ginger millefeuilles
description: Once you've mastered the art of the rough puff pastry here, experiment with the fillings using your favourite flavour combinations.
ingredients: 3 free-range eggs, plus 4 free-range egg yolks
6 lemons, juice and zest of 3 lemons
1 x 250g/9oz jar preserved ginger in syrup
